channel.title: Glock 17 low rate of fire
channel.description: Hi all, I looked for a thread about the steam version of the glock but I haven't found it. I noticed that the steam version of the glock is quite crappy: in the mod it was much more accurate and it's rate of fire depended on how fast you could click. I get it is a weak weapon, but this way it becomes quite useless in advanced levels... I really enjoyed this version instead of the unaccurate and slow one. Can anyone tell me if there is a way to use it as it was originally programmed to work? Thank you :smiley:

item.title: Glock 17 low rate of fire
item.dc:creator: Tuc0
item.description:
I agree that current firing mechanics is balanced, but one thing is quite illogical, that first shot in alt-fire has same inaccuracy like next shots. First shots should be accurate in both firing modes. I don’t remember exact glock mechanics in HL1, but I understand if you want to keep it that same way.

item.title: Glock 17 low rate of fire
item.dc:creator: Freecode
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

What you see is our intentional design for the Glock. The main fire is slow and more accurate, the secondary fire is much faster and less accurate. Same as HL1. A more fun, deep weapon than the mod’s super accurate “fire as fast as you can click” lasergun. Better balanced overall too, given we upped the damage quite considerably.

Seems fair.
Thank you for your quick answer and sorry for my one-year-later reply. I wanted to thank you for all the work you are doing and thrilled to see the fruits of it, whenever it will be.
Have a nice day ^^
